thread.title: Corinthia Hotels appoints international hotelier as new GM of Corinthia Hotel London
thread.title_full: Corinthia Hotels appoints international hotelier as new GM of Corinthia Hotel London

author: eTN Editor
title: Corinthia Hotels appoints international hotelier as new GM of Corinthia Hotel London
text:
Corinthia Hotels appoints international hotelier as new GM of Corinthia Hotel London Adv: Thomas M. Fischer Adv: 
LONDON, England - Corinthia Hotels appointed international hotelier Thomas M. Fischer as the new General Manager of its flagship five-star hotel in London. Moving from his position as General Manager at Corinthia Hotel Budapest, which he has held since March 2012, Thomas will oversee Corinthia Hotel London as it continues to thrive among the cityâ€™s leading five-star hotels. Source: Corinthia Hotels
